projects.name: xenosync
projects.tagline: Multi-agent AI orchestration platform coordinating parallel Claude Code sessions.
projects.description: Coordinates parallel coding agents, reconciles outputs, and improves throughput for multi-threaded implementation work.
readmeHighlights: Coordinates parallel coding sessions across specialized agents.
Includes orchestration controls for retries and merge workflows.
Built to improve throughput while preserving output quality.

projects.name: chatdeb
projects.tagline: Full-stack chatbot for analyzing business data.
projects.description: Combines FastAPI, OpenAI/LangChain, DuckDB/dbt, and React/Next for data-aware conversational analysis.
readmeHighlights: Conversational layer grounded in business data models.
Full-stack architecture with API and modern frontend.
Supports practical exploration of KPI and trend questions.

projects.name: ecommerce-dbt
projects.tagline: End-to-end dbt pipeline on DuckDB with tests, docs, and CI.
projects.description: Demonstrates dbt best practices: schema tests, data documentation, and CI enforcement in a realistic e-commerce domain.
readmeHighlights: End-to-end warehouse modeling with dbt.
Schema tests and docs integrated into CI.
Patterns designed for maintainable analytics engineering.
projects.bannerAlt: ecommerce-dbt lineage and model dashboard preview

projects.name: elt-pipeline
projects.description: Reference implementation for ELT workflows on Snowflake with modular transformations and production-friendly conventions.
readmeHighlights: Production-minded ELT structure for Snowflake.
Reusable transformation layers and model patterns.
Focuses on reliability and maintainability.
projects.bannerAlt: elt-pipeline Snowflake and dbt workflow preview

projects.name: xbot
projects.tagline: OpenAI-powered automation bot for generating posts and images to X/Discord.
projects.description: Automates social content workflows using LLM prompting and media generation with cross-platform posting.
readmeHighlights: Generates and publishes content automatically.
Combines text and image generation flows.
Targets practical automation across multiple channels.

projects.name: xagg
projects.tagline: Streamlit news aggregator combining headlines and market data.
projects.description: Aggregates and presents market context by combining news signals with financial data feeds.
readmeHighlights: Combines headlines with market data for quick situational awareness.
Interactive dashboard for exploration and filtering.
Shows practical integration of multiple external sources.
projects.bannerAlt: xagg news and market data dashboard preview

projects.name: intercoach
projects.tagline: Real-time AI mock interview app with voice conversations, guided question flow, and instant feedback.
projects.description: Open-source interview coaching platform combining adaptive AI interviewers, real-time voice interaction, and actionable post-answer feedback.
readmeHighlights: Practice with an AI interviewer that adapts to your responses.
Get instant analysis of answers with actionable improvement suggestions.
Supports voice interaction with a 3D avatar and real-time lip-sync in the browser.

projects.name: sams-studio
projects.tagline: Full-stack studio management platform with scheduling, bookings, memberships, reporting, and role-based admin/instructor/client workflows.
projects.description: Full-stack studio management platform (Next.js, Supabase, Stripe, Capacitor) with scheduling, bookings, memberships, waivers, reporting, and role-based admin/instructor/client workflows.
readmeHighlights: Unified scheduling, bookings, and membership workflows in one platform.
Role-based views for admins, instructors, and clients.
Integrated waivers, payments, and reporting with Stripe + Supabase.
projects.bannerAlt: Sam's Studio platform dashboard banner preview
